comment: t'anava a preguntar si ho sabies o cunyadejaves (com feia jo), per ja he vist la bio. Merci
amr:
# ::snt t'anava a preguntar si ho sabies o cunyadejaves (com feia jo), per ja he vist la bio. Merci
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / si-sentence
            :snt2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Merci"))
            :snt1 (v / vist-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "T'anava"))
                  :ARG1 (b / bio)
                  :polarity (a / amr-unknown)
                  :mod (p3 / preguntar))
            :snt3 (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (p4 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Cunyadejaves")
                        :ARG1-of (m2 / mean-01
                              :ARG2 (s2 / say-01
                                    :ARG0 (ii / i)
                                    :ARG2 (p5 / person
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "Fia"
                                                :op2 " jo")))))
                  :ARG1 (s3 / sabie))))
